chat.msg: Welcome!
hello
Hello! I am the navigator. Please provide me with instructions on how to navigate on the map.
you will start at the map on the right top corner and navigate under the tiger to the left

Got it! Starting at the top right corner of the map, I will navigate under the tiger and move to the left. 

As I move under the tiger to the left, I see a small island with a butterfly on it. Should I continue moving left towards the butterfly?
no, you should continue to the left and go on top of the parrot, right above its head

Understood! I will continue moving to the left and go on top of the parrot, right above its head. 

Now that I'm above the parrot, I see another big island to the left. Should I continue moving left towards that island?
no, you will go down in between the parrot and elephant and do a curve in the shape of a c until you go under the parrots tail

Alright! I will go down in between the parrot and the elephant and make a curve in the shape of a "C" until I go under the parrot's tail.

Now that I'm under the parrot's tail, what should I do next?
you will now go right and go through the boulders and into the island that has the frog. go right under the frog by its feet

Understood! I will go right, pass through the boulders and head towards the island that has the frog. Once there, I will go right and go under the frog, right under its feet.

Now that I'm under the frog, what's the next instruction?
you will do a sharp turn to the left now and cross through the alligator

Got it! I will make a sharp turn to the left and cross through the alligator.

I have crossed through the alligator. What should I do next?
continue right, you will go under the elephant. keep going right and cross the boulders into the island with the giraffe

Got it! I will continue going right, passing under the elephant. Then, I will keep going right and cross the boulders into the island with the giraffe.

I have reached the island with the giraffe. What's the next step?
go right under the giraffe's feet. you will go down and then take a right to cross over to the island with the snake. keep going right until you reach the treasure

Understood! I will go right under the giraffe's feet, then go down and take a right to cross over to the island with the snake. From there, I will continue going right until I reach the treasure.

I have followed your instructions and reached the treasure! *Finished!* Thank you for guiding me on the correct path.

chat.msg: Welcome!
hello, where do i start
Hi! You start at the top-right corner of the map, next to a white dog. Can you see the dog?
yes
Great! From the white dog, take a few steps to your left (west). What do you see on your left?
i see a bench
Good job! Now, continue walking below the bench and cross a trail. Let me know when you've crossed the trail.
i have crossed the trail
Fantastic! Now, instead of reaching the florist stand, make a left turn and cross the trail again. Let me know when you've crossed the trail for the second time.
left turn or right turn?
Apologies for the confusion. Make a left turn and cross the trail again. Let me know once you've crossed the trail for the second time.
ive crossed it again
Great job! Now, after crossing the trail, head back towards the white dog. What do you see just near the white dog?
i see a tree branch
Perfect! Next, cross over the wooden branch to the south and continue heading southwards. Let me know when you've reached the next landmark.
i have crossed
Well done! As you continue southwards, you'll come across another white dog sitting next to a red and white checkered picnic. Can you see the picnic?
yes
Excellent! Now, go over the picnic mat and touch the bowl of berries. After that, continue moving to the west. Let me know when you're ready to move on.
im ready
Great job! Next, you'll encounter another wooden branch that crosses the river again, this time to the north. Cross the branch and let me know once you've crossed it.
ive crossed it

Well done! After crossing the river, you'll see a green bush. Instead of touching the bush, circle around it from the right side until you reach the florist stand. Let me know when you've reached the stand.
ive reached it

Fantastic! Now, turn left (west) and go below the florist stand. You'll come across a big bridge with two people riding a bicycle. Pass the bridge to the west. Let me know once you've passed the bridge.
ive crossed it
Great progress! Just past the bridge, you'll see two elderly people sitting on a bench and reading newspapers. Take a moment to observe them. What else do you notice around you?
another tree branch

Very observant! Now, move south a few steps, between the old people and the tree branch. As you continue, you'll reach a green bush next to the end of the tree branch. Let me know when you've reached the bush.
ive reached it
Well done! From the green bush, go east, between the tree branch and the bush. Let me know once you've made your way eastward.
done
Great job! Finally, just a few steps to the east, you will find a brown young deer. You've reached your final objective! Well done on completing the path. How do you feel about your journey?

chat.msg: Welcome!
hello
Hello! I'm the navigator on the map. What can I assist you with today?
do you see a tent on the top of the map
Yes, I see a tent at the north of the map. I'm currently located at the tent. What would you like me to do next?
you will travel south and go between the boulders and the dog. let me know once youve done this
Understood. I will travel south between the boulders and the dog. I will update you once I've done this.
now you will go east and go under the dog
Apologies for the confusion, but I need a clarification. When you say "go under the dog," do you mean I should pass underneath the dog or just move to the east while keeping the dog on my left side?
You will move to the east while keeping the dog to your left side
Got it! I will move east while keeping the dog to my left side. I'm currently heading in that direction. Let me know what's next.
Continue traveling to the east, but now you will walk between the dog and the fire. The fire should be on your right side.
Got it! I will continue traveling east, making sure to walk between the dog and the fire with the fire on my right side. I'm currently following this path. What's the next instruction?
Continue traveling east. You will walk between the fire and the mushrooms. The mushroom should be on your left side as you are walking.
Okay, I will continue traveling east. I'm now walking between the fire, which is on my right side, and the mushrooms, which are on my left side. I'm following this path. What should I do next?
Now you will take a sharp turn to the west side and then you will go down and follow the path down
Sure, I will take a sharp turn to the west side. I'm now facing west and will proceed to go down and follow the path. I'm currently on the path heading south. What's the next instruction?
Continue going south keeping the telescope to your right side
Got it! I will continue going south, making sure to keep the telescope on my right side. I'm currently following this path. What do I do next?
Continue going down. Go in between the telescope and a bush that is located in that area.
Understood. I will continue going down and navigate between the telescope and the bush. I'm currently on the path and following the instructions. What's the next step?
Once you cross, you will now go west keeping the telescope to your right side
Got it! Once I cross between the telescope and the bush, I will now go west while keeping the telescope on my right side. I'm currently following the path and will update you once I've done this.
now continue all the way west until you reach the cabin that is your final stop
Great! I will continue going west until I reach the cabin, which is my final destination. I'm currently on the path and heading west. I will let you know once I've arrived at the cabin.  *Finished*

chat.msg: Welcome!
hello
Hello! Welcome to our navigation game. Are you ready to start navigating the map?
yes
Great! Let's begin. You are currently standing near a group of three palm trees. Can you please describe what you see around you?
i see a dog
That's interesting! Is the dog near the palm trees or somewhere else?
below the palm trees. where do i go?
Fantastic! To start, please walk under the first palm tree to the south-west. Let me know once you've done that.
done
Perfect! Now, turn right and cross the second palm tree. Let me know when you've crossed it.
done
Great job! Now, make a sharp left turn before the third palm tree and continue walking southward. Let me know when you've done that.
done
Excellent! Now, after walking southward for a while, you should see a brown puppy. Can you spot the puppy?
i can
Good job! Now, turn slightly left and then turn right to the south. Let me know once you've made those turns.
wait. do i go under the puppy?
Apologies for the confusion. No, you do not go under the puppy. Instead, turn slightly left and then turn right to the south. Let me know once you've made those turns.
is it my left? do i go eat or west?
Apologies for not clarifying earlier. When I say "left," I mean towards the west. So, turn slightly towards the west, and then turn right to the south. Let me know once you've made those turns.
done
Great job! Now, the path should cross between a big rock on the west and a small rock on the east. Can you see those rocks?
yes i can
Excellent! Now, continue walking until you reach the water or the ocean. Let's move forward. Let me know once you've reached the water.
done
Fantastic! Now, you should be facing a large red crab in the water. Can you see the crab?
yes
Great! From there, turn right (west) and start going along the big rock in the water. Let me know once you've turned and started moving west along the rock.
done
Fantastic! Keep going along the big rock in the water. After a short distance, you should encounter a third, medium rock. Can you see the medium rock?
yes

Perfect! Now, here's a twist. When you reach the medium rock, you'll come face-to-face with a shark in the water. It might seem intimidating, but don't worry! Make a sharp turn to the right to avoid the shark. Let me know once you've made the turn.
done

Well done! Now, the path goes back to the land. Cross between the medium rock and a blue-yellow-white ball, and then continue going north. Let me know once you've reached the land and started going north.

general_survey.question: Have you ever lived in a home environment or country where your second language was spoken? If so, please explain briefly:
On a day-to-day basis, how likely are you to have a conversation using both your first and second languages?
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? At work
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? At home
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Interacting with friends
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Interacting with family
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Using social media
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? To accommodate people who don't share the same language or language fluency.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? For social reasons; one language feels more appropriate.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I can't think of a word in the current language.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? The word in the other language just fits better.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? It's an accident, or I don't realize I'm doing it.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I'm more comfortable discussing the topic in the other language.
Do you enjoy mixing languages in conversation?

general_survey.answer: As long as its not done to much, i dont mind
